sentences.sentence: I've never believed. Not in heaven or hell or God or Satan until now.
sentences.translation: 我以前一直都不信。直到现在我才相信有天堂、地狱、上帝和撒旦。

sentences.sentence: Satan uses this secret to make a mysterious look to weave its deception.
sentences.translation: 撒旦用这个秘密装出神秘的样子来编织它的骗术。

sentences.sentence: SATAN has done more to alert people to the risks than cause new disorder.
sentences.translation: “撒旦”更多地提醒人们注意危险，而不是制造新的混乱。
